amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used to block science-based protections for imperiled wildlife that has or may need Endangered Species Act protections.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used to block science-based protections for imperiled wildlife that has or may need Endangered Species Act protections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A081) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 235 (Roll no. 463).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A081) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 235 (Roll no. 463).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A081) offered by Mr. Beyer.
